==Descriptions==
{{Description|An ancient village on Watatsumi Island. It is said that the ancestors of its people came from [[Enkanomiya|deep beneath the waves]].<br />It is also an important rallying point for those who are opposed to the [[Vision Hunt Decree]].|Viewpoint, [[Village of the People of the Deep]]}}
